EmailTemplate.subject: Be Our Guest at The Conference Board’s 2018 Employee Health Care Conference
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
I'd like to extend a complimentary pass to you to attend The Conference Board's 17th Annual Employee Health Care Conference being held March 8-9 in New York or March 27-28 in San Diego.
Join us and learn how employers are driving healthcare value forward through performance and engagement. You’ll gain valuable insights from top employers and industry leaders who will share their organization's experiences, best practices, and practical steps for new health care strategies and innovations.
Your complimentary pass, valued at $2,895, also includes attendance to the pre-conference workshop: Modernizing Benefits Delivery & Administration to Stay Agile and Engaging, being held 1:30 – 5 pm on March 7th in New York and March 26th in San Diego.
For additional details or to download the conference agenda:
Please visit Employee Health Care San Diego or Employee Health Care New York.
If you'd like to take advantage of this complimentary pass, please 1. let us know what city you’d like to travel to 2. let us know if you’d also like to attend the pre-conference workshop 3. give us your contact details a. Name b. Title c. Company d. Mailing Address (HQ is fine) e. Phone f. Email
We will have you registered through The Conference Board and you will receive a confirmation directly from their customer service team in about a week.
Thank you,
Mike Reeve Regional Vice President - West Livongo m: 801.899.5105 e: mreeve@livongo.com a: 150 W Evelyn Ave, Ste 150, Mountain View, CA 94041 www.livongo.com
